title: Business Development Manager - Enterprise Growth
details: We are seeking a dynamic Business Development Manager to drive enterprise growth and build relationships with C-suite executives. This role requires strategic thinking, excellent communication skills, and the ability to understand and address enterprise challenges.
requirements: Proven track record of enterprise sales and growth
Strong understanding of enterprise technology challenges
Experience in cloud services or technology consulting preferred
responsibilities: Develop and execute growth strategies for enterprise clients
Build relationships with C-suite executives and key decision makers
Identify and qualify new business opportunities
Lead complex sales cycles and negotiations
Collaborate with technical teams to develop solutions
Drive revenue growth and market expansion
legalStatus: H1B sponsorship available, open to visa holders
compensation: Competitive base salary with uncapped commission
